channel.title: Please help with character save bug
channel.description: well, i use a very old source (jordiescape), that allows people to create chracters with the same name... how? idk... as example:i create a char named bob and play at it for hours... then i log out, and one guy at another ip with a diferent password but the same character name can create bob too... that for sure will make a save in the bob file, who means if he only log in and out the bob character will back to level 3. can someone help me to fix it?im thanks.

item.title: Please help with character save bug
item.dc:creator: @raulhenriq raulhenriq
item.description:
@raulhenriq wrote:

well, i use a very old source (jordiescape), that allows people to create chracters with the same name… how? idk…
as example:i create a char named bob and play at it for hours… then i log out, and one guy at another ip with a diferent password but the same character name can create bob too… that for sure will make a save in the bob file, who means if he only log in and out the bob character will back to level 3.
can someone help me to fix it?im thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help with character save bug
